cab.content: "Af""!/. if! -^ja.s n C R 3 T *From:C.I.G.SWar Office.G.O.C-in-0., B.i3.F., Italy.22nd Uoveciber, 1917. 10.10 p.in.46223 cipher. -developments in the Italian theatre obviously depend largely upon personality and qualifications of Diaz. He is an unkno^Ti man and War Cabinet would like to know what you think of him.From: General Plumer, B.^.F.f Italy. To: C.I.G.S., War Office.T.43. November 23rd.Your 46223 of 22nd November.He is not a striking personality, but he has the reputation of being a good fighting corps commander. He is gradually getting a grasp of the situation and I think his views are sound. He is certainly very quiet and placid.Received:-24.11.17. 6.35 a.m.
